# Sprite sheet layout (3 columns x 3 rows = 9 frames):
# Row 1: Running frames (3 frames)
# Row 2: Jumping/celebrating frames (3 frames)  
# Row 3: Walking frames (3 frames)

# Frame mapping:
# 0-2: Running (for WALK state)
# 3-5: Jumping/Celebrating (for STEAL state)
# 6-8: Walking/Idle (for IDLE and EXIT states)
